# It appears that there are still no iron ore patches available at this extreme position. This ongoing lack of resources is becoming increasingly problematic.
#
# Since I have not found any iron, copper, or stone resources across multiple locations, I may need to consider a different strategy or approach.
#
# I will now attempt to search for copper ore patches at this extreme position, as they may provide an alternative resource for crafting and construction.

# Searching for nearby copper ore patches around the extreme exploration position.
nearby_extreme_copper_resources = get_resource_patch(Resource.CopperOre, position=new_explore_position_extreme, radius=50)  # Searching for copper patches.

# Display details of any copper resources found in this area.
print(f'Nearby Copper Resource Patches from the extreme position: {nearby_extreme_copper_resources}')  # Output details regarding any found copper resources.
